pullRequest.title: feat: DHIS2-10054: Adding new Axis and Legend support for Visualizations
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR adds support for two new JSONB objects in order to support new Visualization requirements regarding Legend and multi-Axis.
Contains one migration to unify existing JSONB columns/values into the new ones (legend and axes).

commit.message:
feat: DHIS2-10054: Adding new Axis and Legend support for Visualizations

This PR adds support for two new JSONB objects in order to support new Visualization requirements regarding Legend and multi-Axis.

+
+import java.io.Serializable;
+
+import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonProperty;
+import com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat.xml.annotation.JacksonXmlProperty;
+
+import lombok.Data;
+
+/**
+ * Represents the respective Visualization axis definition.
+ *
+ * @author maikel arabori
+ */
+@Data
+public class Axis implements Serializable
+{
+
+    @JsonProperty
+    @JacksonXmlProperty( namespace = DXF_2_0 )
+    private Integer index;
+
+    @JsonProperty
+    @JacksonXmlProperty( namespace = DXF_2_0 )
+    private AxisType type;
+
+    @JsonProperty
+    @JacksonXmlProperty( namespace = DXF_2_0 )
+    private StyledObject labels;

nodes.bodyText: Should we just call this class AxisV2 ? I bit more descriptive than having "refactor" in the package name. E.g. in theory we might have another version 3 at some point. I think we should rename to just Axis once we have removed the old object.

commit.message: Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-core into DHIS2-10054
fix: Updating the Flyway script version.
